title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 

(Pesticide Residues) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (pesticide residues) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Communities (Pesticide Residues) Regulations 2008
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Pesticide Residues) Regulations 2008 
(S.I. No. 565 of 2008) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the 
definition of “Pesticide MRL Regulation”, (as amended by the European 
Communities (Pesticide Residues) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. 
No.613 of 2022)), the following–

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. The European Communities
text_raw:
3. The European Communities 

(Pesticide Residues) 

(Amendment) 

Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 613 of 2022) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the maximum residue levels (MRL) for certain plant 
protection products permissible in food and feed as provided for under 
Regulation (EC) No 396/2005. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [164] 11
